Module com.example.sudokuminiproyecto2fpoe
Package com.example.sudokuminiproyecto2fpoe.controller

Class HomeControllerAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.sudokuminiproyecto2fpoe.controller.HomeControllerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
iHomeController
Direct Known Subclasses:
HomeController
public abstract class HomeControllerAdapter extends Object implements iHomeController
Version:
1.0 Abstract adapter class implementing the Sudoku home controller interface. Provides base functionality for board initialization, text field handling, and help features.
Author:
Juan Arias, Steven AragÃ³n

  • Method Details

    • initializeBoardCells

      public void initializeBoardCells()
      Initializes the 6x6 Sudoku board with styled text fields. Creates and configures each TextField with: - Light blue borders - Dark blue text - Centered alignment - Fixed dimensions (100x100) - Bold font (size 20)
      Specified by:
      initializeBoardCells in interface iHomeController

    • handleTextFields

      public void handleTextFields(int row, int col)
      Handles text input validation and styling for Sudoku cells. Implements: - Numeric input restriction (1-6) - Visual feedback for valid/invalid entries - Game state updates on valid moves
      Specified by:
      handleTextFields in interface iHomeController
      Parameters:
      row - The row index (0-5) of the cell
      col - The column index (0-5) of the cell

    • handleHelp

      public void handleHelp(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the help button click event. Delegates to the Positions class's help functionality.
      Specified by:
      handleHelp in interface iHomeController
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the button click
